data.name: Lockes The Thief
data.detailed_description:
Things are about to get busy in this 3rd Person Hip-Hop-Zelda-Like! Easy and fun gameplay for all ages! Fight and sneak past villians and help protect a magical energy source.

On a mysterious land known as The Slabland, The Soldiers, The Sneaks and The Sages have co-exsisted. But then The Sages were gifted an other worldly gemstone called the unRealistic from the heavens. The unRealistic gave them the ability to tap into mysterious magickal power! A few jealous Sneaks and Soldiers have banded together to make a tribe called The Sludge and they plan to steal the unRealistic so they can have this ultimate skill! But one Sneak is not loyal to this plot.

As Lockes The Thief, fight and fool The Sludge with your sneak thief tactics. While communicating with a new Sage companion, The Muse, figure out who is a Sludge and disable their plot before it is too late!



Engage in combat with enemies and bosses, conversations with NPCs, collect and steal loot, uncover the mysteries of the tribes, and protect the ultimate power of The unRealistic Diamond! Will Lockes The Thief be able to stop the sinister plot and increase his Luckie Stack?
data.about_the_game:
Things are about to get busy in this 3rd Person Hip-Hop-Zelda-Like! Easy and fun gameplay for all ages! Fight and sneak past villians and help protect a magical energy source.

data.short_description: Play a smooth talking, slick walking, stealth sneaking thief and steal for the greater good...and yourself, of course. Use your wits and your hits in this Hip-Hop-Zelda-Like!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x64, Windows 8x64, Windows 10x64 (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (3.40 GHz) or better; Quad-core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 454 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x64, Windows 8x64, Windows 10x64 (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 (3.60GHz) or better; Quad-core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (DirectX 11 graphic card required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 454 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card (Surround Sound 5.1)
